title: Ancient Egyptian pharaoh's boat reassembled in real time at Grand Egyptian Museum
description: The Grand Egyptian Museum has begun reassembling a boat belonging to Pharaoh Khufu in its exhibition hall. The cedarwood vessel, one of two found with King Khufu, started coming together on Tuesday as visitors watched. The project is expected to...

title: Ancient Irish legends and myths surrounding the Cliffs of Moher
description: The Irish myths and legends about the Cliffs of Moher in Co Clare are second to none.

title: Eagle Archives, Dec. 27, 1971: Gravestone rubbing: An ancient art is riding a new wave of popularity here
description: Eagle Archives, Dec. 27, 1971: Gravestone rubbing is being rediscovered as a way to preserve history and explore early-American artistry.

title: Ancient Egypt treasures to be brought to life at new London exhibition
description: A major new exhibition, Ramses and the Pharaohs’ Gold, will open at Battersea Power Station in 2026, showcasing rare Ancient Egyptian artefacts never before seen outside Egypt.

title: The challenges of managing an ancient woodland - one acorn at a time
description: Across Britain, ancient woodland has become one of our most endangered habitats, writes our columnist.
